typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as string,
		Name as string,
		LastModifytime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source
source alterRow(updateIf(1==1),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		Name as string,
		LastModifytime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['PersonID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		Name,
		LastModifytime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinksql
